RelatedSentence: LITTLE ROCK , Arkansas ( Reuters ) - As voters head into primaries on Tuesday in the southern swing state of Arkansas , one of the most fiercely debated issues among Republican candidates is the centerpiece healthcare policy of President Barack Obama , a Democrat .

A group of Arkansas Republicans are battling for their political lives in primary showdowns with challengers from their own party who are trying to excoriate them for reaching a compromise with Democrats on a state health plan .

Pryor and Cotton face no serious threats in the primaries .
